import moment from'moment';function formateDate(date){return moment(date).format('YYYY-MM-DD ddd');}function formateTime(date){return moment(date).format('hh:mm:ss a');}function relativeTime(date){//like last sunday or last saturday
return moment(date).calendar();}export default{formateDate:formateDate,formateTime:formateTime,relativeTime:relativeTime};
